title: About Myself
text: Hi welcome to my website! I’m Hongda Yuan, or Tony if you like. I finished my undergrad at the University of Nottingham, with a Bachelor’s degree in Honors Statistics. And I’m currently a master student in Applied Statistics at the University of Michigan. Here is the link to my CV.
